data.title: Take a Tour of the Newark Airport Terminals
data.meta_description: Traveling through Newark Airport? Learn how to navigate the three Newark Airport terminals. Dining, shopping and other amenities can be found throughout.
data.text:
Newark Airport (EWR) has been in operation since 1928 and serves over thirty airlines. EWR is one of the three major airports in the New York Metropolitan area, and it sees over 42 million passengers each year. Newark Airport is a bustling hub for domestic and international travelers, and it features three terminals. Pink Elephant Long Term Parking provides offsite parking services to travelers flying out of all the Newark Airport terminals. We offer safe parking near EWR coupled with exceptional customer service and benefits for affordable, stress-free vehicle accommodation.

The Three Newark Airport Terminals

At EWR, passengers will find terminals A, B, and C. Each of the Newark Airport terminals feature a different selection of shopping options, dining choices, and amenities, and they each serve a different purpose. Here’s what you can expect from each of the Newark Airport terminals.

• Newark Airport Terminal A

Terminal A serves domestic and regional flights. Inside this terminal, passengers will have ample opportunities to dine and shop before and after the security checkpoints. Dining options include Italian food, grab and go sandwiches, burgers, juices, pizza, and ice cream. Shopping in Terminal A includes duty-free stores, newsstands, clothing boutiques, and handmade gift shops. Travelers will also find charging centers, nursing suites, pet relief stations, and currency exchange booths in Terminal A.

• Newark Airport Terminal B

International travelers leave from Terminal B. Dining options in Terminal B include burritos, subs, fast-food, beer, sushi, and sandwiches. The three concourses in this terminal are jam-packed with delicious options to delight any foodie. Retail options in this terminal include newsstands, duty-free stores, and candy stands. Shoeshine services, nursing suites, and currency exchange stations are also available.

• Newark Airport Terminal C

Newark Airport Terminal C serves United Airlines flights and features a wide selection of amenities, shops, and restaurants. Passengers often think of Terminal C as the first stop on their vacation thanks to its delightful atmosphere and exciting selection of places to eat and shop. Enjoy a grab and go meal before your flight or order a cocktail and savor a sit-down meal to make the time go by faster. Terminal C is known for its relaxing spa and interfaith chapel that passengers can enjoy at their leisure. Terminal C is by far the most adorned of the Newark Airport terminals.

Why Choose Pink Elephant Long Term Parking for Your Parking Reservation?

Savvy travelers know that onsite parking at Newark Airport can be expensive and stressful. Why waste time circling the lot for a spot when you can park with us much more affordably? At Pink Elephant Long Term Parking, we’ve got the best rates on convenient Newark Airport parking to meet your needs and save you money. Our team is dedicated to bringing you the best parking services in New Jersey. Here are just some of the benefits you’ll enjoy when you book your reservation at Pink Elephant Long Term Parking:

• 24-Hour Newark Airport Shuttle

When you book your reservation at Pink Elephant Long Term Parking, you’ll have access to our speedy Newark Airport shuttles. Don’t worry about coordinating a ride to and from the airport, we will get you there on time and pick you up promptly when you return.

• Close to Newark Airport Terminals

No matter which terminal you are flying out of, our facility is close enough to the airport to get you there on time. We know our way around Newark and EWR, so you won’t have to deal with traffic or confusing airport navigation.

• Secure Newark Airport Parking Facility

Do you worry about your car while you are away? When you park with us, you’ll never give it a second thought. Our facility is equipped with a security system and a fence to keep your vehicle safe and secure at all times.

• Free and Guaranteed Reservations

At Pink Elephant Long Term Parking, we offer free and guaranteed reservations to make parking with us a stress-free experience. You can be certain that there will be a spot waiting for you when you arrive at our facility, and you can cancel any time before your reservation for a full refund.

• Complimentary Luggage Handling

Let us do the heavy lifting when you park with us. Your driver will be happy to load and unload your luggage for you. As a Pink Elephant Long Term Parking customer, you won’t have to worry about dragging your luggage across the EWR lot.
